frontmatter.title: I Just Survived. It's Hand to Mouth.

markdownRemark.html: This video is of Sharron Maasz, who died tragically in January 2019. In the video, shot by the Invisible People project, Sharron describes her own path from homelessness support worker into homelessness herself, and what it's like to be rough sleeping as a woman.
